programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep142
programme.desc: The Vegetable Pie - Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep143
programme.desc: The Surprise - They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Campfire Stories - It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Pups Save Old Trusty / Pups Save a Pony - Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser to stop water sprouting up all over town. // Priscilla the pony gets the chance to help the Paw Patrol rescue their own vehicle after they help her out of a canyon.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Pups Save the Parade - Adventure Bay Parade Day goes awry when Alex puts too many balloons on Katies bathtub float. It literally floats away!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Tiny Dancer / The Sleepy Sun - Dora shows the twins a music box with a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life! Bailarina's adelita boots run away, so we need to get them back. // The sun won't set because it can't fall asleep! Dora needs to find Pillow Cloud so Sol can set.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep512
programme.desc: The Mechanic Team! - Blaze stops into Gabby's Garage for a quick repair - just as she gets an alert! Three far-flung trucks need her mechanical know-how! So, Blaze and AJ volunteer to help her take her garage on the go!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Big Balloon Rescue - All of Axle City is enjoying the Balloon Fair - until Crusher and Pickle get stuck on a runaway hot-air balloon! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue their high-flying friends... before they crash into the Slime Volcano!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger / Pups Save A Royal Painting - When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Coral Dilemma - When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices - While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Paddington's Favourite Hero / Paddington And The Skateboarder - Paddington struggles to choose a hero for a special photo wall in the park - maybe he needs to look closer to home. // Paddington becomes a heroic skateboarder, thanks to Mateo and a special mask - but how magical is the mask?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Library Tea Shop / The Crew Builds A Dance Floor - Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution. / Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Little Axolotl / Bubble Trouble - Dora and Boots find an adorable baby axolotl. They have to bring him home, but he keeps wandering off. // The Big Red Chicken gets stuck in a giant floating bubble and is heading straight for a volcano! Dora has to do a mid-air rescue to save him.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Blazing Amazing Stories - Blaze and AJ are babysitting for Baby Gherkin! When it's time for her nap, they tell her three epic bedtime stories about police, cowboys, and superheroes - all starring Blaze and his friends!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Crystal Of Strength / Clamity - Injured from training and eager to feel strong again, Rammy gets the squad to go in search of the legendary Crystal of Strength on Sparkle Island. // When Steel takes a pearl from a clam, it chases him through the city to try and get the pearl back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pups Save the Soccer Game / Pups Save a Lucky Collar - Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play. // The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Pups Save a Floundering Francois - Capn Turbot and his cousin Francois are whale watching when the Flounder hits a rock and starts to sink! This rescue needs all paws on deck.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Lemonade Stand / The Crew Builds A Wildlife Bridge - After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove! // Why does Crunchy the beaver cross the road? Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Super Tub - When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Alebrije Adventure / Let's Get A Paleta - Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help! The Alebrije tree is wilting, so it's up to Dora to find its rainbow water. // On a super hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! Dora goes to rescue her and get paletas for everyone.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie / Guacamole - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry. // Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Paddington And The Three Musketeers / Paddington And The Dinosaur Hunt - It's World Book Day and Paddington helps Mateo discover his favorite character to dress up as. // Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt on the island in the park, but dinosaurs don't exist any more, do they?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Pups Save a Robosaurus / Pups Save a Film Festival - When a homemade Robotic Dino named Earl comes to life, the pups need to find him, stop him, and bring him home. // The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox / Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records. // A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake - Jake and Chase go deep cave spelunking when Jake ends up getting his ankle stuck between some fallen rocks!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case - There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments - When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the band's instruments break, Rubble & Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Tres Leches Trouble / Wizzle Wozzle Woo - Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Benny's abuela. //Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise that caused them to lose their instruments.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Bedtime Story - Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza / Bread - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil! // Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Big Rig Blaze - When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes' Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul it all back - a Big Rig! There's nothing he can't pull with that Big Rig Force!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Space Alien Adventure! - Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormy's jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Buds At First Bite - Baby enlists Goldie's help to show Penny Piranha how to stop biting.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Ah! My Beautiful Castle / The Sand Is Disappearing - During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. // Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Paddington and the Cursed Halloween Show / Paddington saves the Mooncake Festival - It's Halloween, but will a curse on the theatre stop the community putting on their special spooky play? // Taylor the lifeguard arrives in Windsor Gardens just in time to save the Mooncake Festival with Paddington.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm - Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town. // Rubble and Motor come up with crafty construction solutions to fix Farmer Zoe's squirrel problem before the Farm Fair.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Rainforest Ritmo / The Magic Nut - Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there! // Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut that can turn into your favorite food.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep517
programme.desc: The Blaze Family - Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Baby Steel / Joke's On You - When Steel accidentally turns himself into a baby, he wreaks havoc on Platinum City. // It's the annual "Day of Fun"! However when Ricardo and Trickalien play the ultimate prank on the Deer Squad, the day of fun soon turns into a day of chaos!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. // Alex loses his first tooth, then really loses it.The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Pups Save the Pop-Up Penguins - Stowaway penguins have scattered around Adventure Bay! Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Fountain Show / The Crew Builds A Carousel - When Sierra Sparkle's big concert stage needs some extra sparkle, Rubble & Crew use a construction complication to make a big splash. // Rubble & Crew decide to go big when Grocer Gabriel wants something special built outside of his grocery store.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Paperplane Race - Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Give-Away Day - Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie / Guacamole - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry. // Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Paddington And The Three Musketeers / Paddington And The Dinosaur Hunt - It's World Book Day and Paddington helps Mateo discover his favorite character to dress up as. // Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt on the island in the park, but dinosaurs don't exist any more, do they?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lighthouse - The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Pups Save a Robosaurus / Pups Save a Film Festival - When a homemade Robotic Dino named Earl comes to life, the pups need to find him, stop him, and bring him home. // The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox / Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records. // A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake - Jake and Chase go deep cave spelunking when Jake ends up getting his ankle stuck between some fallen rocks!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case - There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments - When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the band's instruments break, Rubble & Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Tres Leches Trouble / Wizzle Wozzle Woo - Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Benny's abuela. //Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise that caused them to lose their instruments.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.desc: The Golden Gate Bridge, USA - On a very foggy day, The Golden Gate Bridge's foghorns are missing. Can the Go Jetters help?

programme.desc: Home Again - Whats the Future for Young Gambians? - Paabi was deported from Libya during his second attempt to reach Europe illegally. Back in his home country Gambia, hes trying to use a 1,000 Euro reintegration loan to build a new life for himself. But things arent going well.

programme.title: Arts Unveiled
programme.desc: Hollywood's Best Director: M. Night Shyamalan - M. Night Shyamalan is considered one of Hollywoods greatest directors. The psychological thriller "The Sixth Sense" shot him to moviemaking heights. His sci-fi and fantasy films are international blockbusters. He tells us what its all about.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: The Magazine for Africa's Youth - This week's show explores the experiences of young Africans living on the continent and abroad. First, we delve into the factors compelling Nigerian youth to leave their country. Then, in our street debate, we engage with African expats in Hamburg, Germany to understand the requirements for success in a new country. African comedian Basketmouth shares his insights into the 'japa' debate.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: Truck art in Pakistan: Canvases on wheels - Truck art is an essential part of Pakistani transport tradition. It has become a cultural expression that is also causing a business boom for lorry drivers and transport owners. DW's Irfan Aftab visited a truck workshop in Karachi, where mechanics and artists transform heavy vehicles into on-wheel artifacts.

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: The Global Auto and Mobility Show - Women on wheels: Why are females more likely to be injured or die in car accidents? Male-centric crash test dummies impact vehicle safety and design. And: Hit the road with a long-haul trucker whos married to her rig.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Diving and Gaming - The double life of an Olympic athlete - Dolores Hernandez is among Mexicos best divers, aiming for the highest honor in her sport. But Dolores leads a double life. In 2023, financial support for the Mexican Swimming Federation was cut dramatically. To fulfill her dreams Dolores had to find a different way to get money, so she became a night-time gamer.

programme.title: Tomorrow Today
programme.desc: The Science Magazine - Ancient knowledge - earthquake-proof buildings made with clay and straw. Also: AI and how its being used to piecing shattered cuneiform tablets together, generate deceptively real videos, and protect diabetics when driving.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: A Construction Revolution - How to Build Sustainably - Building in harmony with nature, using renewable materials from the region. Sustainable building is still an adventure. But in future, its likely to be necessary.

programme.title: In Good Shape
programme.desc: The many forms of fungi - Fungi come in many different forms! Some are edible, packed with vitamins and minerals. Others boast hallucinogenic properties. And still others can colonize our skin or intestines and lead to chronic disease.

programme.desc: In Beiruts Shadow - Hoping for a Miracle - In the Palestinian refugee camps of Sabra and Shatila, people live at subsistence level. They have no civil rights and no prospects. The Palestinian camps set up in Beirut after the founding of Israel still seem like makeshift arrangements, even today.

programme.title: Arts Unveiled
programme.desc: How women are conquering metal - Metal bands are tough, hairy, loud, and especially... male. So goes the cliche but is it that really true? We take you on a deep dive into the history of women in the metal scene and highlight bands and singers such as Doro Pesch, Burning Witches, Slave to Sirens or Nervosa. What were the first female metal bands? What prejudices do the bands face? Is Metal really a safe space?

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Samurai Wisdom
programme.desc: Solidifying Tokugawa shogunate rule, "born shogun" Iemitsu, the third of his line, paved the way for dramatic change via political reform and new ideas.

programme.title: Cinematic Journey
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: The head Inari shrine has 30,000 subordinate shrines throughout Japan. Since its foundation in 711, the Inari deities attract worshippers with varying needs.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions (28 Min.)
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: online karaoke services & umbrella bagging machines.

programme.title: Bosai:Heatstroke
programme.desc: Heatstroke occurs when your body overheats, causing nausea, delirium and even death. Find out how human body models and urban climate simulations are integrated to detect and prevent heatstroke.

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking that we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "10 Stick Anime"...

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Standing Boy Of Nagasaki
programme.desc: Who is the boy who waits stoically to cremate his dead brother in Nagasaki? The search for his identity continues, as the iconic image has come to symbolize the fate of "atomic-bomb orphans."

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hiroshige Blue
programme.desc: Hiroshige's struggles to become a successful ukiyo-e artist is supported by his devoted wife. Using a paint called Berlin blue, he pursues his passion for painting, but success comes at a price. Ep.1

programme.desc: The Ainu: indigenous people of northern Japan. Time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke investigates various aspects of their culture and traditions. This time: Ainu Forest.

programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-18.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Throughout Japan's history, the waxing and waning moon has been loved, cherished, and given many special names. We explore the moon's continuing significance in agriculture, fishing, and daily life.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: A cat takes a nap among the fragrant flowers at a farm that grows sweet pea flowers. Another cat takes a nap at an archery range! We meet more local cats as residents celebrate a unique tradition.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Students at a hairdressing school in Kochi, Japan frequently take the top prizes in national competitions. They learn by sharing their styling secrets. Will that approach help them this time around?

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Elegant and practical, braided cords are essential for kimono and other aspects of everyday life.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: A summer adventure at a ski resort provides the chance to see magical views and enjoy thrilling forest activities, sparking an entirely different kind of excitement from the usual winter pastimes.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep903VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC and reigning featherweight champion, Alexander Volkanovski defends his title against Jiu-Jitsu savant, Brian T-City Ortega at UFC 266. See both men train and prepare to fight for the UFCs 145-pound title.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Wish You Were Here - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep705
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Fighter Focus: Sean Woodson, My Moment: Miesha Tate, Inside the UFC: UFC Gloves - Despite adversity and the loss of his father at a young age, Sean Woodson forges a successful UFC career. UFC Bantamweight Miesha Tate looks back at her title-winning performance at UFC 196. Inside the history, concept, and design of the UFCs revolutionary new glove design that will be used for the first time at UFC 302.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 ACROBATICS GOALS
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 ACROBATICS GOALS - Golazo! 10 of the best volleys & scissor kicks that found the net from the Ligue 1 22/23 season.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC280OliveiravsMakhachev
programme.desc: UFC 280 featured a battle for the vacant lightweight title between former champion Charles Oliveira and Islam Makhachev. Plus, Aljamain Sterling defended his bantamweight belt against TJ Dillashaw. See the whole main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep17
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1005UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between long reigning middleweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and UFC vet Leon Rocky Edwards. See their fight like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep904NamajunasvsZhang2
programme.desc: New Yorks Madison Square Garden hosted a rematch between Thug Rose Namajunas and Zhang Weili at UFC 268. See both women train and prepare for battle once again to decide the queen of the strawweight division.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Fight of the Night - Earning Fight of the Night honors is a tall task on a UFC fight card. On this episode of UFCUnleashed, weve got three bouts that were so good, they earned athletes an extra $50k. Featuring Molly McCann, Julian Marquez, Dominick Reyes, and more.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions
programme.desc: Grappler vs Grappler - Earning a submission victory inside the famed UFC Octagon takes skills and talent that few possess. UFC Ultimate Submissions brings you a collection of the greatest grappling finishes the MMA world has ever seen.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women - Round 5: IBK Altos vs AI Peppers
programme.desc: Round 5: IBK Altos vs AI Peppers - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: UFC 304: Edwards vs. Muhammad 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On July 28, the UFC is back Manchester, England for its first visit to the Co-op Live Arena, and its bringing plenty of heavy hitters to the Octagon for a stacked UFC 304 card. In the main event, Birminghams Leon Edwards defends his welterweight title for the third time against an old rival in Belal Muhammad, who brings a 10-fight unbeaten streak into this long awaited rematch. Plus, interim heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall will also meet an old foe, as Manchesters own defends his belt against the only man to defeat him in the Octagon,Curtis Blaydes.

Vicente Luque shares how the UFC gave him the means to accomplish his childhood dreams of turning his first car into a racecar.
